pageContext.description: Butt end very badly damaged and edges of flanges destroyed. Blow-hole in base of diaphragm. On upper face faint trace of broad shield with depression below stop-ridge. Hammered edge.Very slight transverse ridge on sides just above stop ridge.
pageContext.patina: Brown patina on one face. Spots of blue oxide on diaphragm.
pageContext.surface: Under side of blade badly pitted and pimpled.
pageContext.other: Width: edge 50mm; centre 26mm; butt broken,Thickness; centre 7mm; 34mm,Weight: 271.53 gms
pageContext.associations: See palstave No. 2596: found with gold ?torc and broken bronze bracelet.
pageContext.publications: Evans. Anc. Br. Imps. p.90 (mentions one palstave only)
pageContext.site: England, somerset,ilminster,winterhay green,found in draining allotment
